mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.cate_id AS "cateId", a.name AS "name", a.score AS "score", a.note1 AS "note1", a.note2 AS "note2", a.note3 AS "note3", a.note4 AS "note4", c.id AS "pjValueCategory.id", c.name AS "pjValueCategory.name", c.statu AS "pjValueCategory.statu"
LEFT JOIN pj_value_category c ON c.id = a.cate_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pj_value_details( id, cate_id, name, score, note1, note2, note3, note4 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{cateId}, #{name}, #{score}, #{note1}, #{note2}, #{note3}, #{note4} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pj_value_details SET cate_id = #{cateId}, name = #{name}, score = #{score}, note1 = #{note1}, note2 = #{note2}, note3 = #{note3}, note4 = #{note4} WHERE id = #{id}
